snippet: The new confederation of Central American has refused to hold any further communication with Mr. CHATFIELD, as British Consul. the Tribune publishes the official documents relating to the subject. It seems that the following circular, was issued i...
lead_paragraph: The new confederation of Central American has refused to hold any further communication with Mr. CHATFIELD, as British Consul. the Tribune publishes the official documents relating to the subject. It seems that the following circular, was issued in January, to all the representatives of Foreign Powers:
abstract: The confederation declines intercourse with Brit. Cons. Chatfield, the correspondence
